title: Support Vector Machine (SVM) Weighted Samples
description: In this lab, we will learn how to plot a decision function of a weighted dataset in SVM. We will create a model that takes into account sample weights and another model that does not take into account sample weights. We will then compare the two models by plotting their decision functions.
